<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>x_g_irm_fms.PortalInsensitivityRedirect </name><script><![CDATA[function portalRedirect() { 
if ((document.URL.indexOf('Fms') != -1) || (document.URL.indexOf('FMS')) != -1) { //replace ess with the site name and make sure to cover all cases (i.e. ESS, Ess, EsS, ESs, etc.)
window.location = '/fms/'; 
} 
} 
addLoadEvent(portalRedirect); ]]></script><script_name>PortalInsensitivityRedirect </script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>PuriA@state.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-23 18:39:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>4134a7c61b6994100a4a10ad9c4bcb06</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_g_irm_fms.PortalInsensitivityRedirect </sys_name><sys_package display_value="FMS" source="x_g_irm_fms">c728dd331b3fc8100a4a10ad9c4bcbb6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="FMS">c728dd331b3fc8100a4a10ad9c4bcbb6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_4134a7c61b6994100a4a10ad9c4bcb06</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>PuriA@state.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-23 18:39:47</sys_updated_on><ui_type>10</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
